EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_NYRoundtable_Q114.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Roundtable with Paul Maritz 3/19
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for our upcoming roundtable. You will be joined by an intimate group of your peers to hear and share insights specific to Financial Services. We're looking ahead a year or two at the kind of impact Big Data, PaaS and Agile Development can have on your business future. We look forward to you joining us. Here are the details of the event: Date: Wednesday, March 19, 2014 Time: 6:00PM EST Where: BLT Prime, 111 East 22nd Street, NY, 10010 Agenda 6 - 6:30pm Networking Cocktails 6:30 - 8pm Roundtable and Light Supper
Questions? <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>
